subject: Re: [junit] JUnit Implementation for an already developed J2EE application
msgSnippet: ... You may find 2 books helpful ... JUnit Recipes by J.B Rainsberger and Working Effectively With Legacy Code by Michael Feathers. Cheers Shane [Non-text
messageBody:
On 9/2/05, Pramod Kumar <pramod.kumar@...> wrote:
>
> Hi '
>
> Can any one tell me what would be the best approach to implement the
> Junit testcases
> for an already developed J2EE application.

You may find 2 books helpful ... JUnit Recipes by J.B Rainsberger and
Working Effectively With Legacy Code by Michael Feathers.
Cheers
Shane
